name: The Gauls
declaringWar: Unfortunately, your time has come; it is foretold in the stars.
attacked:
Hm. Another upstart think they're the ones to finally supercede the venerable Etruscans, after a millennia. 
Unsuprising.
defeated:
When I'm out there all alone 
And feeling far from home 
I'm fading into blue 
And there's nothing I can do Then out on the sky like a flash 
Sending me high, high, high 
You rescue me 
You saved me from a certain tragedy 
I get messages from the stars 
When you're making love to me 
I get messages from the stars 
You must be from another galaxy
introduction:
I am Tyrrhenus, and you are in my slice of Eturia. 
Fear not, for this is a land of civilization and hospitality.
neutralHello:
When I'm out there all alone 
And feeling far from home

hateHello:
Oh... it's you people. 
Can't you find someone less wealthy to pester?

When I'm far out in the night 
And searching for a light 
There's darkness all around 
And you're nowhere to be found 
Then out on the sky like a flash 
Sending me high, high, high 
You rescue me 
You saved me from a certain tragedy 
I get messages from the stars 
When you're making love to me 
I get messages from the stars 
You must be from another galaxy
tradeRequest:
Let us talk trade, for nothing's more fruitful than a civilized discussion, trust us. 
Or should I say, Etrust us, ah...? 

Haha we're fun 
we have fun here.
uniqueText:
Non-Capital cities suffer -15% [Gold] and [Production] plus an extra -15% [Production] of military land units, 
but get a weaker version of the palace and -40% unhappiness and increase in policy [Culture] cost. 
 Great merchants are earned +40% faster and allied city state yield +40% of their [Gold] output. 
+1 [Gold] and +1 [Culture] from [Marble].
uniques: Gain a free [Let's Get The Bag] [non-[Annexed]]
[+50]% Strength <when stacked with a [Settler] unit> <for [Melee] units>
Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [-40]% less than normal
[-3 Gold, -2 Culture, -1 Production, -1 Science, -1 Food] [in capital]
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [40]% of what they produce for themselves
[-15]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]
[Great Merchant] is earned [+40]% faster <when not at war>
